precaution: Clear your surroundings to make sure you do not knock over any items. Tell the system if your fingers are numb.
instruction: Hold the wallet with your left hand.
With your right hand, use your thumb and first finger to unzip the wallet.
Put the wallet back on the table.
With your right hand, take a coin out of the wallet.
Place the coin on the table.
Take out the remaining coin from the wallet.
Stack this coin on top of the other coin.
